basics.name: Craig Gardener
basics.label: Chief Technology Officer | Head of Engineering | DevSecOps Expert
basics.summary: Visionary technology leader with a strong background in DevSecOps, cloud infrastructure, and software development automation. Recognized as a GitLab Champion and skilled in implementing CI/CD and secure development practices across large-scale systems. Proven ability to align technical strategies with business objectives, improve development practices, and optimize technology operations to drive growth and innovation.

work.name: Domain7
work.summary: Directed the engineering team for the Carbon Trust website redevelopment, establishing a globally distributed environment on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE).
highlights: Built testing and deployment pipelines with Google Cloud Build, integrating DevSecOps practices to ensure secure and reliable code deployment.
Oversaw stakeholder management, setting realistic timelines and budget expectations while ensuring project deliverables met high standards.

work.summary: Contributed to the Salford University website project, developing custom modules and enhancing CI/CD workflows.
highlights: Employed GitLab CI to streamline deployments and introduced DevSecOps principles to enhance security in the development process.

work.name: Capgemini

highlights: Implemented data replication and disaster recovery protocols for secure database management, ensuring compliance with security policies.
